solution_line_template: Farrah ordered {num_boxes} boxes from Amazon containing {matchboxes_per_box} matchboxes each, a total of {num_boxes}*{matchboxes_per_box}=<<{num_boxes}*{matchboxes_per_box}={total_matchboxes}>>{total_matchboxes} matchboxes.

If each matchbox has {sticks_per_matchbox} sticks, the total number of match sticks that Farah bought is {sticks_per_matchbox}*{total_matchboxes} = <<{sticks_per_matchbox}*{total_matchboxes}={total_match_sticks}>>{total_match_sticks}
